meta_title: Lead Time Meaning in MRO: Calculation, Optimization & Cost
meta_description: Understand the true meaning of lead time in maintenance. Learn how to calculate it, reduce supply chain latency, and use AI to optimize MRO inventory levels.
title: Lead Time Meaning: The Hidden Cost of Waiting in Maintenance Operations

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Lead Time Meaning: The Hidden Cost of Waiting in Maintenance Operations

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern, clean industrial manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance professionals (a woman and two men) wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests are gathered around a large industrial motor. One is holding a tablet (back facing camera) pointing at the machine, implying digital analysis. In the background, blurred automated conveyor belts and robotic arms are in motion. The lighting is cool industrial blue with warm highlights on the people, emphasizing a high-tech, efficient atmosphere. No text or words in the image.
